content.text:
# Citra Award for Best Cinematography

}}
The Citra Award for Best Cinematography () is an award presented annually at the Indonesian Film Festival since its inaugural edition in 1955, to honor the achievement in cinematography. Starting in 1979, the award began to introduce nominees.
Winners and nominees
